title: Kissing Kate
description: Kate and Amber have been best friends for as long as they can remember. So, following the whole best friends fall in love with each other cliche, it was only natural that they would fall for each other. Ever since they reached their preteens, they'd both known that they were different from all the other girls their age. But, they didn't know how different they were....that is, until Amber kissed Kate. It was just one little kiss...but, that's all it took for their world to come crashing down around them.
author: Via Love
